name: DJ Jam and the Legend of the Mixtape Master
name_original: DJ Jam and the Legend of the Mixtape Master
description:
DJ Jam and the Legend of the Mixtape Master is a 3D Platformer made for the Super Rare Mixtape Jam #1.

Use the power of your mixtape by fast forwarding and rewinding through songs that will aid you in your journey to reach the top of the Tower of Tapes!

Like most jams, a lot of things had to be cut, and I would've loved to spend more time trying to make it look nicer but hey, it is what it is! I had a blast making this and it's a cool idea I might come back to. 

Music by the fantastic @Kota_music1

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Fast Forward
Right Mouse Button - Rewind
Middle Mouse Button/Left Shift - Pause
Spacebar - Jump
Escape - Quit Game
